Text: RE Enron bid CPS RFQ bid clarificationquestions Cc Enron North American Daren Farmer Smith Street Houston Texas Thank you for your bid CPS is currently evaluating all bids Part of this process includes where needed clarificationconfirmation of the bids We emphasize we are not seeking nor can we accept any change of bids Our understanding of the your bid reflects in part unbundled gas supply year term to Waha Agua Dulce or Thompsonville up to MMBtud at stated bid prices firm baseload no nomination bundled gas supply year term to CPSKarnes or CPSEl Paso up to MMBtud at stated bid prices firm baseload no nomination CPS needs clarification of total volumes available combining maximum unbundled and bundled gas supply We may have other questions as we continue our evaluation We look forward to your response Please respond via email to me and all parties in the Cc box above or by fax to Ms Trisha Wiatrek at and copied to Barry Williams Again thank you for your bid Sincerely Barry S Williams Geologist City Public Service PO Box Navarro San Antonio TX
